DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, cards in your hand with #yFire #yCounters make you take damage equal to their #yFire #yCounter. They then increase the #yFire #yCounter. Cards with #yFire #yCounters play an additional copy of themselves for every #yFire #yCounter above #b1, and #yExhaust.
After a number of turns, add #b2 #yDespairs to your hand and lose #b5 #yStrength.
